CHANGELOG
=========

1.1.0 (2018-03-20)
------------------

 * Update dependencies
 * Enable Symfony 4
 * Fix Twig loader

1.0.0 (2016-12-30)
------------------

 * Add predefined formats (https://gohugo.io/content/front-matter/)
 * Add support for NEON
 * Add support for Toml
 * Enable Symfony 3.0

0.1.0 (2015-08-11)
------------------

 * Add support for Json
 * Add support for Yaml
 * Initial implementation
